#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

int A[10001];

int main() {
        int T;
        scanf("%d", &T);
        while (T--) {
                memset(A, 0, 10001*sizeof(int));
                int maxNum = 0;
                int min = 10001;
                int n;
                scanf("%d", &n);
                int *arr = new int[n];
                for (int i=0;i<n;i++) {
                        scanf("%d", &arr[i]);
                        A[arr[i]] ++;
                        if (A[arr[i]] > maxNum || (A[arr[i]] == maxNum && arr[i] < min)) {
                                maxNum = A[arr[i]];
                                min = arr[i];
                        }
                }
                printf("%d %d\n", min, maxNum);
                delete [] arr;
        }
        return 0;
}
